text:
Hi guys, I just started with HubSpot, and was trying its getting started tutorial, which deploys a website. But when I was at the step where you have to click on create (in Marketing>Website>Website Pages) I was getting an error message : "You do not have permission to create website pages. Request permissions from your administrator."
Can someone please help?
Sounds like you’re not an admin or otherwise do not have sufficient permissions assigned in the portal you’re working with
I’d try creating a developer test portal and working in there until you can get your permissions upgraded
But I created my own developers account, shouldn't I have all the permissions? :confused:
